extendedInfo.description: âââââââââââââââââââââââ50% Promotional Sales! Limited Time Only!âââââââââââââââââââââââGarden Plants Bible is an application containing detailed information of over 2000 species of plants commonly found in the garden or in the wild. It is probably the most complete and comprehensive plants encyclopedia available in the App Market. This App is an excellent app for people who love gardening or botany or for those who are interested in studying and knowing more about plants and using them to decorating your garden. For each type of plants, the following information is included for easier reference:- High Quality Photo (if applicable)- Common Name- Scientific Name- Family- DescriptionThe application is optimized for all Android devices running on OS 1.5 or above.âââââââââââââââââââââââFEATURESThis application has the following features:- 2-Level Category Views with THUMBNAIL preview of each item- All Category View to preview all items in alphabetical order- Single Category View to list items of the same category- Ability to BOOKMARK selected items for easier reference- A plant name SEARCH engine- OFFLINE browsing âââââââââââââââââââââââThis application is brought to you by Colakey LLC.

reviews.title: Very disappointing
reviews.comment: Having read the reviews I was sceptical about downloading app but as it was updated 30/4/13 I thought it was worth giving it a go. I was wrong!. Very few pictures. Rose brings up one item only.
reviews.author: David Belcher

reviews.title: Not what I thought
reviews.comment: I bought this and its not what I thought it was nor what I wanted. It tells you the genus and the scientific name. That\'s wonderful, I want to know if it grows in full sun, shade, what region its best in. What plants go well in the same bed. Non of this.
reviews.author: Annette Wolfe

reviews.title: Doesn\'t seem to work right on Driod Razr
reviews.comment: All I get on this app is scientific name list.  The list icon on bottom left of screen doesn\'t bring up any options!!  Wish I could get my money back.  Can only look up plant if I already know the name.  Barbara No. CA
reviews.author: A Google User
